snippet: Mr. Jensen was an educational psychologist whose 1969 article suggested that the gap in intelligence-test scores between black and white students might be rooted in genetic differences.
abstract: Arthur R Jensen, educational psychologist who ignited debate over IQ, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jensen was an educational psychologist whose 1969 article suggested that the gap in intelligence-test scores between black and white students might be rooted in genetic differences.

headline.seo: Arthur R. Jensen, Who Set Off Debate on I.Q., Dies
headline.main: Arthur R. Jensen Dies at 89; Set Off Debate About I.Q.
headline.print_headline: Arthur R. Jensen Dies at 89; Set Off Debate About I.Q.
